public int hashCode() {
    	int h = hash;
    	if (h == 0) {
    	    int off = offset;
    	    char val[] = value;
    	    int len = count;
    
                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
                    h = 31*h + val[off++];
                }
                hash = h;
            }
            return h;
        }
